description: League Two play-off hopefuls Chesterfield sign Brentford winger Michael Olakigbe on loan until the end of the season.
title: Michael Olakigbe: Chesterfield sign Brentford winger on loan
title_page: Michael Olakigbe: Chesterfield sign Brentford winger on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Promotion-chasing Chesterfield have made their third January transfer window signing by bringing in Brentford winger Michael Olakigbe on loan until the end of the season.
The 20-year-old joins the League Two play-off hopefuls, who are currently ninth - six points off the top six and only eight points adrift of the automatic promotion places.
Olakigbe, who moved to Peterborough United in the January window a year ago, spent the first half of this season on loan at League One side Wigan Athletic.
As well as Olakigbe, the Spireites have made the loan transfer of Lincoln City winger Dylan Duffy permanent for an undisclosed fee.
Duffy, 22, has signed a contract with them until 2027.
